title: [Cancer] A dendritic cell vaccine administered before and after autologous stem cell transplant was safe and associated with durable clinical responses in patients with high-risk multiple myeloma. After 4.2 years, 6 out of 7 patients who had a positive clinical response were alive and remained disease-free.
